js.Cookie

type
class

Static Methods

all() : Hash<String>

Returns all cookies

exists(name : String) : Bool

Returns true if a cookie name exists

get(name : String) : Null<String>

Returns value of a cookie.

remove(name : String, ?path : String, ?domain : String) : Void

Remove a cookie

set(name : String, value : String, ?expireDelay : Int, ?path : String, ?domain : String) : Void

Create or update a cookie. expireDelay (seconds), if null, the cookie expires at end of session
